title: Is there a book about the science of losing weight? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A Flavio Aquino Yes there would be and one of them would be by Eric Helms or from the Renaissance periodization (RP) Group Eric Helms:Muscle and Strength Pyramids RP:Renaissance Diet 2.0
I am sure there are many books. However, if you would like a free book that can help you then I hope you find this helpful. 8 Week Fat Loss Mastery
